=== About Me ===

My name is Luis Cano.I am a Systems engineer, speaker, geek and activist in the promotion and diffusion of free software for many years. Member of the Free Software community in Colombia called Colibrí, Iskariote, Mozilla Colombia, Ubuntu Colombia, Debian Colombia, Hackerspace of Bogota called Hackbo,Collective RedPaTodos and PPCO.
